description: Delicious served hot or cold for lunch, brunch or dinner. Great for lunch boxes. Slice to whatever size slice you desire.
name: Sweet Potato Zucchini & Bacon Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs parsley, finely chopped, can use dried

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. Preheat oven to 180 degrees fan. Grease and line (with over hang on each side to act as a handle to lift out) a 20 cm square ovenproof baking dish.
In a frypan on medium heat, add oil and onion, cook for 3 minutes stirring often, do not brown, add garlic and cook a further minute. Off the heat and set aside to cool slightly.
Into a large mixing bowl add flour, sweet potato, zucchini, bacon, cheeses, parsley, pepper and mix well to combine.
Add beaten eggs, cooled onion and garlic, mix well again.
Spoon mixture into prepared baking dish and smooth the top.
This step is optional - I like to scatter bread crumbs over the top before baking in the oven. Gives a lovely toasty topping.
Bake at 180 degrees fan for 45 minutes or until cooked in the centre.
Remove from oven and set aside to cool for five minutes before removing from baking dish. Slice to whatever size slice you desire.
